Created attachment 23871
patch to correct the problem

The server signature shows the incorrect platform.

A lot of people keep mailing me that my binaries I provide for win64 are horribly broken due to this. I don't consider it broken, just incorrect and trivial to fix.

I've attached a simple 3 line fix for os/win32/os.h that hopefully is conform the coding guide lines.

If it's not I'll be happy to correct it. The patch is tested against 2.2.11, 2.2.10 and 2.2.8 and works on all of those.
